types.html:
prise en charge f (plural prises en charge)

  1. management (of something), care (for something)
  2. pick-up (by a taxi); pick-up fare, minimum fare
    taux de prise en charge, frais de prise en charge, tarif de prise en charge ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)
  3. payment (of some costs)
    la prise en charge des soins médicaux ― covering of medical costs
  4. care, nursing, treatment (of a patient)
    la prise en charge d'un patient ― (please add an English translation of this usage example)

title: prise en charge
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /pʁiz ɑ̃ ʃaʁʒ/
